name: The Last King Marches
description:
The Last King Marches

Project made for the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022

https://itch.io/jam/gamedevtv-jam-2022

## How to play:

- Explore the levels and find the shards, so you can help the ghost of the last king of a reign find his final path.

- Move: asdw or arrows

Know bugs:

- Tree tiles could disappear in level 4.

Credits:

- Tileset from DragonDePlatino (look for Platino!)(credits to DawnBringer)

https://opengameart.org/content/dawnlike-16x16-universal-rogue-like-tileset-v181

Music (all by  RandomMind):

- The Bard’s Tale - https://www.chosic.com/download-audio/28494/ 

- Minstrel Dance - https://www.chosic.com/download-audio/28495/

Sound effects made with Bfxr!

Repository: https://github.com/mateuslucch/LastKing
